reviewText: The quality of the DVD is very good and the customer service was fantastic. I had some problems with the subtitles and the seller was very prompt in rectifying the issue. My 4-stars rating was for the movie itself.  Although I love Ivy Ling Po and her wonderful singing, I didn't find this movie as interesting as "General Hua Mu Lan".  Still it is a light-hearted, fun kind of movie if you are looking to pass a couple of hours of your day.
